Does modifying the input signal \\( x(t) \\) directly affect the output \\( y(t) \\) if the kernel \\( k(t, s) \\) remains unchanged?

As long as the kernel \\( k(t, s) \\) stays constant, any changes in \\( x(t) \\) translate to corresponding changes in \\( y(t) \\) due to the linearity of the integral operator.
